item.title: Announcing Grok
item.description: Grok is an AI modeled after the Hitchhiker‚Äôs Guide to the Galaxy. It is intended to answer almost anything and, far harder, even suggest what questions to ask!

item.title: Announcing PromptIDE
item.description: Integrated development environment for prompt engineering and interpretability research.

item.title: Open Release of Grok-1
item.description: We are releasing the weights and architecture of our 314 billion parameter Mixture-of-Experts model Grok-1.

item.title: Announcing Grok-1.5
item.description: Grok-1.5 comes with improved reasoning capabilities and a context length of 128,000 tokens. Available on ùïè soon.

item.title: Grok-1.5 Vision Preview
item.description: Connecting the digital and physical worlds with our first multimodal model.

item.title: Series B funding round
item.description: xAI is pleased to announce our series B funding round of $6 billion.

item.title: Grok-2 Beta Release
item.description: We announce our new Grok-2 and Grok-2 mini models.

item.title: API Public Beta
item.description: Starting today, developers can build on our Grok foundation models using our newly released API. We will run a public beta program until the end of 2024 during which everyone will get $25 of free API credits per month.

item.title: Grok Image Generation Release
item.description: We are updating Grok's capabilities with a new autoregressive image generation model, code-named Aurora, available on the ùïè platform.

item.title: Bringing Grok to Everyone
item.description: Grok is now faster, sharper, and has improved multilingual support. It is available to everyone on the ùïè platform.

item.title: xAI raises $6B Series C
item.description: We are partnering with A16Z, Blackrock, Fidelity Management & Research Company, Kingdom Holdings, Lightspeed, MGX, Morgan Stanley, OIA, QIA, Sequoia Capital, Valor Equity Partners and Vy Capital, amongst others.

item.title: Grok 3 Beta ‚Äî The Age of Reasoning Agents
item.description: We are thrilled to unveil an early preview of Grok 3, our most advanced model yet, blending superior reasoning with extensive pretraining knowledge.

item.title: Grok 4
item.description: Grok 4 is the most intelligent model in the world. It includes native tool use and real-time search integration, and is available now to SuperGrok and Premium+ subscribers, as well as through the xAI API. We are also introducing a new SuperGrok Heavy tier with access to Grok 4 Heavy - the most powerful version of Grok 4.

item.title: Announcing xAI for Government
item.description: We are excited to announce xAI For Government ‚Äì a suite of frontier AI products available first to United States Government customers.

item.title: Grok Code Fast 1
item.description: We're thrilled to introduce grok-code-fast-1, a speedy and economical reasoning model that excels at agentic coding.

item.title: Grok 4 Fast
item.description: Pushing the Frontier of Cost-Efficient Intelligence

item.title: Expanding xAI for Government with GSA OneGov
item.description: Expanding ‚ÄòxAI For Government‚Äô with more accessible AI tools for the Federal Government
